Title: Login fails with valid credentials
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to login page
2. Enter valid email/password
3. Click "Sign In"

Title: Mobile menu not opening
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open mobile site
2. Tap hamburger menu

Title: Checkout price miscalculation
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add 3x $10 items
2. Apply 10% coupon
3. Proceed to checkout
